wallDescription: A simple wall of rough hewn stone

gameObjects.name: Cave in
gameObjects.description: Some heavy rocks blocking a pathway. You could dig it out with an appropriate tool.

gameObjects.name: passage to the next room
gameObjects.description: A creaking, half open wooden door.

gameObjects.name: passage to the next room
gameObjects.description: A wooden door, closed. You can hear someone speaking behind, and the sound of water trickling.

gameObjects.name: Dusty skeleton
gameObjects.description: A crumbling skeleton, with yellowed bones and a cracked skull.
